item.title: Shawna add a quote by Nicholas Black
item.description: "Reading is like running: like it or not we all have to do it. Everybody on this planet needs to be able to read. And everybody on this planet needs to be able to run. I'm pretty certain that if you are incapable of either of those two things then your place in society is going to be decidedly more uncomfortable." -- Nicholas Black

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Jeff Goins
item.description: "When I started writing every day, I realized a painful truth: I canâ€™t react and create at the same time. Neither can you." -- Jeff Goins

item.title: Shawna add a quote by Sarah McCoy
item.description: "It means we let God be the judge. It's too big a job for you or me. We have to stop being afraid of the shadows and realize that the world is made up of shades of gray, light ad darkness. Can't have one without the other." -- Sarah McCoy
